pattern: (i|we) (want|would prefer|wish to have|would like to have|would like to get) (a different|a new|an alternative) (recipe|recommendation|meal|dish)
(pls|please|we|I)? (recommend|suggest|would like to have|would like to get|would like to cook) (something different|a different meal|a different recipe|a different dish|an alternative recipe)
